Posts.Content: Apr 11, 2017 09:14PM AngieGma wrote: I saw the surgeon today. She says my lump appears as a cancer but might be a radial scar instead. She is doing a lumpectomy and a biopsy of the whole lump next Wednesday.
Posts.Title: BIRAD vs Biopsy AngieGma MTwoman

Posts.Content: AngieGma wrote: My radiologist gave me a BIRADS 5. He told me he's done this for 30 years and is so sure it's cancer that if it comes back benign I need to have a new biopsy done. My biopsy results came back as benign (or course). I'm going to a surgeon for a second opinion. My hope is that they'll remove the lump and rebiopsy it. Has anyone had a benign biopsy result and still had cancer? My radiologist was pretty certain. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: BIRAD vs Biopsy AngieGma MTwoman

Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2017 04:29PM AngieGma wrote: Excisional biopsy results came back as Radial Scar with no malignancy. Yay!!! I don't know if this with increase my chances for cancer or not. All my research contradicts itself but I will be vigilant on mammograms in the future.
